lessons.japanese: 仕事量に応じて報酬が支払われます。
lessons.english: You'll be paid according to the amount of work you do.

lessons.japanese: 我々は後半生に豊かな報酬を手にするだろう。
lessons.english: We will reap rich rewards later on in life.

lessons.japanese: ニックは決してその報酬に満足していない。
lessons.english: Nick is by no means satisfied with the reward.

lessons.japanese: その弁護士への報酬はとても高かった。
lessons.english: The lawyer's fee was very high.

lessons.japanese: その仕事はあまりおもしろくなかったが、他方で報酬が良かった。
lessons.english: That job was not very interesting, but on the other hand it was well paid.

lessons.japanese: その仕事の報酬をもらった覚えがない。
lessons.english: I don't remember getting paid for the work.
This is more than I have earned.

lessons.japanese: 欲の深い男はその報酬には決して満足しなかった。
lessons.english: The greedy man was by no means satisfied with the reward.

lessons.japanese: 報酬を受け取るのを彼のプライドが許さなかった。
lessons.english: He was too proud to accept any reward.

lessons.japanese: 報酬は山分けにしよう。
報酬はあなたの成功次第です。
lessons.english: The reward is dependent on your success.
